user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.

• Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)
• Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
• Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category; call it something relating to 'PCIPMI capacities Unlimited'. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
• Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
• Add a max flow property to each object in the 'H2 interconnection' and 'H2 Internal bottleneck' categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step. Use the crud pipeline
• Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Use the CRUD pipeline to get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate datafile attribute from the available options.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for PCIPMI infrastructure by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, modify the H2\Gas data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category, naming it something related to 'PCIPMI capacities Unlimited'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate category for the new datafile object within the Gas Pipeline.

tasks.description: Update the newly created datafile object's properties by adding the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, update the datafile object's properties to include the filename property.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, create the scenario 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities'.

tasks.description: For each object in the 'H2 interconnection' and 'H2 Internal bottleneck' categories of the gas pipeline class, add a max flow property referencing the datafile and scenario created previously.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the objects in the 'H2 interconnection' and 'H2 Internal bottleneck' categories and update their properties with the max flow attribute referencing the new datafile and scenario.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the model to clone and associate it with the new scenario.
